SerNet verinice 1.6.2 Beta - Codename 'Constructa'
(c) SerNet Service Network GmbH and others 1996-2012
Visit our homepage: http://www.verinice.org Contact the authors: verinice@sernet.de

Artwork: Blackbit http://www.blackbit.de Icons by Axialis Team http://www.axialis.com Icons by Yusuke Kamiyamane http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com Icons by FAMFAMFAM http://www.famfamfam.com Joseph North <north@sublink.ca> Agentur Roeder http://www.agentur-roeder.de

cheatsheet.name: Risk Management according to ISO 27005
cheatsheet.description: This tutorial will show you how to accomplish a risk assessment based on the international standards ISO 27005 with verinice. Let's get started.
